channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Meta's $2b Manus acquisition sparks concerns from Chinese regulators
item.description: Chinese regulators are worried about Manus' move to Singapore, so new parent company Meta could be in trouble.

item.title: Amazfit’s stylish budget tracker is nearly matching its best price to date
item.description: Amazfit might not have the name recognition of a company like Garmin or Fitbit, but its wearables consistently impress, with the Amazfit Active 2 being one of the best fitness trackers you can buy. And right now, it’s on sale for just $84.99 ($15 off) at Amazon, Best Buy, and Target, which is only $5 […]

item.title: X’s deepfake machine is infuriating policymakers around the globe
item.description: X's Grok chatbot hasn't stopped accepting users' requests to strip down women and, in some cases, apparent minors to AI-generated bikinis. According to some reports, the flood of AI-generated images includes more extreme content that potentially violates laws against nonconsensual intimate imagery (NCII) and child sexual abuse material (CSAM). Even in the US, where X […]...

item.title: OpenAI unveils ChatGPT Health, says 230 million users ask about health each week
item.description: The feature, which is expected to roll out in the coming weeks, will offer a dedicated space for conversations with ChatGPT about health.

item.title: Razer joins AI bandwagon with external AI accelerator backed by iconic AMD chip architect
item.description: Razer announces Forge AI Dev Workstation at CES 2026 alongside a compact Tenstorrent external AI accelerator.

item.title: This phishing campaign spoofs internal messages - here's what we know
item.description: Crooks are abusing misconfigurations to trick victims into thinking they received an email from their bosses and HRs.

item.title: Stop chasing AI experts
item.description: Start building the right AI skills in the right roles.

item.title: ChatGPT is launching a new dedicated Health portal
item.description: OpenAI is launching a new facet for its AI chatbot called ChatGPT Health. This new feature will allow users to connect medical records and wellness apps to ChatGPT in order to get more tailored responses to queries about their health. The company noted that there will be additional privacy safeguards for this separate space within ChatGPT, and said that it will not use conversations held in Health for training foundational models. ChatGPT Health is currently in a testing stage, and there are some regional restrictions on which health apps can be connected to the AI company's platform.The annou...

item.title: ‘Frankenstein’ and ‘Sinners’ Get Screen Actors Guild Awards Love—’Andor,’ Not So Much
item.description: The Actor Awards (formerly known as the SAG Awards) will be presented March 1, with a ceremony streaming on Netflix.

item.title: Watch Live as NASA Astronauts Conduct Spacewalk to Prep the ISS for its Demise
item.description: On Thursday, a pair of astronauts will venture outside the space station to prepare for the future installation of roll-out solar arrays that will help power its deorbit in 2030.

item.title: How to watch The Pitt season 2 online from anywhere
item.description: An intense 15 hour ER shift is covered in 15 real-time episodes. Here’s how you can watch The Pitt season 2 online and from anywhere including the UK, US, Australia and beyond.

item.title: Loads of free content is coming to The Elder Scrolls Online this year — here are the four biggest additions
item.description: We break down some of the biggest additions coming to The Elder Scrolls Online throughout 2026.

item.title: Firm overseeing FCC’s Cyber Trust Mark Program withdraws over ties to China
item.description: UL Solutions will no longer be the USCTM's Lead Administrator because of the company's ties with China.

item.title: Spotify : vos amis peuvent désormais voir ce que vous écoutez en temps réel, voici comment activer cette fonction
item.description: Spotify ne lâche pas l'affaire. Après avoir lancé sa propre messagerie l'été dernier, le géant suédois va plus loin. Dès aujourd'hui, vos amis peuvent voir votre activité d'écoute en temps réel directement dans vos discussions.

item.title: MTV Is Officially Dead. It’s Time for Zombie MTV to Live in Your Browser
item.description: MTV Rewind is the closest thing you can get to glory days of the boob tube.

item.title: Dell admet que l’IA ne fait pas vendre de PC, c’est même l’inverse
item.description: Vous en avez marre qu'on vous colle de l'IA à toutes les sauces ? Vous n'êtes pas seul. Dell s'est rendu compte d'une réalité brutale : le terme « AI PC » ne fait pas vendre. Pire, il embrouille tout le monde.

item.title: Allez vous craquer pour l’un de ces téléviseurs lifestyle Hisense bientôt disponibles ?
item.description: La marque Hisense a profité du CES de Las Vegas pour annoncer la prochaine commercialisation de plusieurs téléviseurs dits « lifestyle ». Comprenez qu’ils proposent des designs particulièrement originaux au détriment d’une fiche technique assez classique.

item.title: The best VPN deals: Up to 88 percent off ProtonVPN, Surfshark, ExpressVPN, NordVPN and more
item.description: It's a new year, and a great time to fulfill your resolution to practice better cybersecurity. The early days of January are a great time to grab a last-minute subscription for yourself or a loved one. With access to a virtual private network (VPN), you can stream TV shows and events from all over the world, protect your information from hackers and thwart online trackers. Although we strongly recommend using a VPN, jumping on the first deal that comes along might get you stuck with a substandard app. Beyond that, even otherwise respectable VPNs sometimes frame their prices in misleading ways...

item.title: 10 gadgets from CES 2026 that you can buy right now: Dell, Xreal, Soundcore, more
item.description: CES 2026 just started, but a handful of new gadgets are already available to buy as of Jan. 7. Shop drops from Xreal, Anker, and more.

item.title: Motorola just announced a foldable phone to rival Samsung and Google at CES
item.description: Samsung and Google have new competition in the foldable space. At CES 2026, Motorola unveiled its first side-foldable smartphone: the Razr Fold. The handheld sports an impressive 6.6-inch external screen and an 8.1-inch flexible main display. Motorola hasn’t provided dimensions yet, so we don’t know how thick it is yet or how it compares to other foldables in that respect.We do know, however, that it'll include support for the Moto Pen Ultra stylus. This is actually a fairly big deal, as Samsung dropped the feature for the Z Fold 7. Modern foldables basically double as tablets, so a stylus is ...

item.title: « Le grand public n’achète pas » : Dell admet que l’IA ne fait pas vendre de PC
item.description: Derrière les grands discours fiévreux de l'industrie de la tech qui s'est engouffrée comme un seul homme dans l'IA, il y a une réalité : le grand public n'achète pas un produit parce qu'il y a marqué « IA » dessus. C'est le constat lucide dressé par un dirigeant de Dell.

item.title: If you love thick carpets, Roborock's new hovering robot vacuum is about to become your new cleaning BFF
item.description: It will raise itself to the perfect height to clean without ever getting stuck.

item.title: Hisense veut vous aider à faire la fête en musique en 2026 avec les enceintes nomades Party Storm, FlexBoom, VoyageBoom et WeBoom
item.description: Hisense renforce son catalogue d’enceintes nomades avec une gamme complète pensée pour la maison, les soirées et l’usage outdoor, articulée autour des modèles Party Storm, FlexBoom, VoyageBoom et WeBoom. L’objectif est de couvrir aussi bien les besoins d’animation de grandes fêtes que l’écoute mobile du quotidien.

item.title: How to use a VPN on iPhone
item.description: Installing a virtual private network (VPN) on an iPhone or iPad is easy. The days are gone when Apple users had to be content with the leavings from the Windows ecosystem — in 2026, all the best VPN services have secure, user-friendly iOS apps on par with every other platform. If you've decided to add a VPN to your iPhone to stay anonymous online and change your virtual location, you've got plenty of great choices.Since you're here, chances are you're familiar with the benefits of using a VPN, including security on public Wi-Fi and the ability to explore streaming libraries in other countries....

item.title: Clap de fin pour Realme et OnePlus ? Oppo réorganise toute sa structure en 2026
item.description: Les marques "indépendantes" du groupe BBK, c'est fini. Huit ans après son émancipation, Realme perd son statut d'entreprise autonome pour redevenir une division d'Oppo.

item.title: SAG Actor Awards nominations 2026: One Battle After Another and Sinners dominate
item.description: SAG-AFTRA announced the nominees for the 2026 Actor Awards, and "One Battle After Another" and "Sinners" continue to lead the pack.

item.title: Election Deniers Think the Venezuela Attack Is All About 2020
item.description: Conspiracy theorists claim the capture of Venezuelan president Nicolás Maduro is proof that the Venezuelan government rigged the 2020 election in Joe Biden’s favor.

item.title: Character.AI and Google settle with families in teen suicide and self-harm lawsuits
item.description: Character.AI and Google have reportedly agreed to settle multiple lawsuits regarding teen suicide and self-harm. According to The Wall Street Journal, the victims' families and the companies are working to finalize the settlement terms.The families of several teens sued the companies in Florida, Colorado, Texas and New York. The Orlando, FL, lawsuit was filed by the mother of 14-year-old Sewell Setzer III, who used a Character.AI chatbot tailored after Game of Thrones' Daenerys Targaryen. The teen reportedly exchanged sexualized messages with the chatbot and occasionally referred to it as "his...

item.title: Lux Capital lands $1.5B for its largest fund ever
item.description: The 25-year-old firm is an early investor in Anduril, Applied Intuition, and Runway AI.

item.title: The best TVs of CES 2026: brighter OLEDs, 130-inch screens, and RGB mini-LED everywhere
item.description: CES 2026 is a showcase for new TV tech, with RGB mini-LED models from a range of brands looking to bring the fight to OLED's picture quality dominance

item.title: The Vision of 2026 in ‘Metropolis’ Is Spot On
item.description: The 1927 silent classic got a few technology predictions wrong but was scarily on the mark about workers' rights and out-of-touch industry oligarchs.

item.title: I found the best robot vacuums for every floor, budget, and level of laziness (after testing 30+ models)
item.description: I'm always testing new vacuums from brands like Roborock, Shark, and Eufy to find the best robot vacuum mop combo, budget steals, and more.

item.title: Ces lunettes ajustent votre vue automatiquement, et cela sonne la fin du calvaire des verres progressifs
item.description: i vous portez des verres progressifs, vous savez de quoi je vais parler : bouger la tête sans cesse pour trouver la zone de netteté. C'est infernal. La start-up finlandaise Ixi promet de régler ça avec des lunettes capables de faire le point toutes seules. Le prototype pèse 22 grammes, mais il faudra attendre 2027.

item.title: Bételgeuse va-t-elle bientôt devenir une supernova ? Les astronomes ont enfin une réponse
item.description: Entre fin 2019 et début 2020, la supergéante rouge Bételgeuse a montré des signes de faiblesse laissant penser que son explosion inéluctable en supernova à quelques centaines d'années-lumière du Système solaire était peut-être imminente. D'autres hypothèses ont été formulées et récemment de...

item.title: NASA Rockets Toward Artemis 2 Launch With Possible SLS Rollout Next Week
item.description: If the rollout happens on NASA’s current schedule, astronauts could be headed back to the Moon next month.

item.title: Xiaomi YU7 : 1300 km d’autonomie avec ou sans recharge ? Le patron s’explique
item.description: Lei Jun est en colère. Le patron de Xiaomi s'est retrouvé au cœur d'une tempête médiatique après une déclaration sur l'autonomie de son futur SUV, le Xiaomi YU7. On l'accuse de promettre 1300 km sur une seule charge. Sa réponse ? C'est faux, c'est la faute des « trolls », et il a une explication très simple.

item.title: Fujifilm's latest Instax camera looks like a vintage Super 8
item.description:
Fujifilm just revealed the Instax mini Evo Cinema camera, which looks suspiciously like a vintage Super 8. More specifically, it was designed to mimic the Single-8 from 1965, which was a rival unit to the Super 8. Fujifilm's latest device captures video, just like its retro inspiration. Wow, the new FUJIFILM Instax Mini EVO Cinema camera looks nuts.. esp the decade slider thing for the looks. If the cost isn't nuts this could be a must have... Needs to be around $249/299ish to be a hit https://t.co/6w8JPsBxIg pic.twitter.com/plcmNhfyT7— derek morleY (@derekmorley) January 7, 2026
However, th...

item.title: HP's new EliteBoard made me believe in keyboard computers again
item.description: A keyboard computer has always been on my wishlist — that is, a computer where the entire machine was stuffed into a keyboard. Perhaps I caught a glimpse of the Commodore 64 at an impressionable age, but regardless, the idea has always been intriguing to me. At CES 2026, HP is bringing that concept back with the new EliteBoard G1a, which is dubbed a “Next Gen AI PC.”It's an IT administrator's dream: It looks a typical desktop keyboard, but it has the full power of a Copilot+ AI PC inside. You can equip it with Ryzen 5 or 7 CPUs and their embedded Radeon 800 GPUs, up to 64GB of RAM and as much ...

item.title: Edifier dévoile une gamme complète d’enceintes polyvalentes au CES 2026
item.description: Le fabricant chinois Edifier profite du CES 2026 de Las Vegas pour présenter une nouvelle collection d'enceintes actives et de moniteurs de studio.

item.title: AMC previews its new show, ‘The Audacity,’ focused on Silicon Valley
item.description: As one of the show's actors, Billy Magnussen, noted, "Silicon Valley is one of those times in our modern era which is defining humanity. And what better place to make a dark comedy than in that place that develops our society at this point?"

item.title: The Trump administration just gave the food pyramid a Sweetgreen makeover
item.description: The government has redesigned America’s food guidelines for the MAHA era. President Donald Trump’s administration has introduced a new, inverted food pyramid with fewer food groups.

item.title: L’Oréal’s latest flat iron uses infrared light to make hairstyling much faster
item.description: Hair gadgets have become increasingly popular over the last decade. Hair dryers, curlers, steamers - you name it, there's probably a TikToker shilling for the latest hair gadget that will totally revolutionize a hair routine. Even so, I was excited to get a demo of L'Oréal's Light Straight at CES 2026. It's an extension of […]

item.title: NWS AI-Generated Weather Predictions Are Making Up New Towns
item.description: Expect rain in Whata Bod.

item.title: PS5 Hyperpop : voici les nouveaux coloris et manettes DualSense en édition limitée
item.description: Sony vient d'officialiser trois nouveaux coloris pour la PS5 Slim et la manette DualSense. Baptisée "Hyperpop", cette collection mise sur des dégradés flashy rouge, vert et bleu. C'est joli, c'est officiel, mais l'addition est salée.

item.title: GameStop says CEO compensation package doesn’t include any guaranteed pay
item.description: CEO Ryan Cohen won’t receive any guaranteed pay, which it defines as no salary, no cash bonuses, and no stock that simply vests over time. GameStop is providing details on a new compensation package for CEO Ryan Cohen that is dependent on him meeting certain “significant” performance targets.

item.title: Non, Word et Excel ne vont pas disparaître : Microsoft met fin à la panique
item.description: Depuis 24 heures, les réseaux sociaux s'enflamment : Microsoft aurait tué la marque Office pour la remplacer par Microsoft 365 Copilot. C'est faux. Word et Excel vont bien. Mais derrière cette fake news virale se cache un vrai problème de communication chez Microsoft.

item.title: CES 2026 day 3: the 11 best gadgets we've seen today, from IKEA smart lights to the Motorola Razr Fold
item.description: The news, announcements, and discoveries from CES 2026 are continuing – here are our picks from Day 3.

item.title: Xgimi Titan Noir Max : vers encore plus de contraste pour ce vidéoprojecteur haut de gamme
item.description: Au CES 2026, Xgimi dévoile le Titan Noir Max, un projecteur 4K laser qui mise sur un système de double iris dynamique pour renforcer le contraste et la profondeur des noirs, avec l’ambition de rivaliser avec les références du home cinéma haut de gamme.
